item.title: Merchant Center SSO
item.author: asdrubal@juniqe.com (Asdrubal Gonzalez Penton)
item.description: We do use SSO with Juniqe Google Apps user database. Auth0 is used as OIDC provider. https://docs.commercetools.com/merchant-center/single-sign-on-beta Usage Open https://mc.commercetools.com/login/sso Enter organisation name “juniqe” In Auth0 opening dialog, click “Continue with JuniqeGoogleApps” In Sign in with Google, sign in into juniqe google account(gmail) You are in! new users have no privilgies, Administrator supposed to invite them to proper groups after first login Setup for new CT Org Setup G Suite Enterprise connection in Auth0 (follow Auth0 instructions).
